snippet: A legal dispute over the right to use a school bathroom is unfolding in Colorado as other states seek to clarify their policies relating to transgender students.
abstract: Case of Coy Mathis, 6-year-old Colorado student who is biologically male but identifies as female, is at heart of legal dispute over right to use school bathroom that is likely to test Colorado's anti-discrimination law; occurs as other states are seeking to clarify their policies relating to transgender students.
lead_paragraph: A legal dispute over the right to use a school bathroom is unfolding in Colorado as other states seek to clarify their policies relating to transgender students.

headline.seo: In Colorado, a Legal Dispute Over Transgender Rights
headline.main: Dispute on Transgender Rights Unfolds at a Colorado School
headline.print_headline: Dispute on Transgender Rights Unfolds at a Colorado School
